(async) addFile(data) → {addFileResult}

Add a file
Parameters:
Name Type Description
data object
Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
id string The file id
name string The name of the uploaded file
file string The name of the file in storage
size number The size in bytes of the file
type string The mimetype of the file
uploadedBy string The username of the uploader
uploadedAt string The upload date & time of the file
uploadedUntil number | null The date a file is uploaded until or null for infinity
album string <optional>
 The optional id of an album to add the file to
isPrivate boolean <optional>
 If the file is hidden from the user page for others
